Package cnc.logic

Class Drill

  • java.lang.Object
    • cnc.logic.Drill
  • public class Drill
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for calculating all drill coordinates triggered by g-codes. Coordinates are stored on ArrayList coordinates.
    Author:
    Simon, Tim und Jonas

        public void writeM​(int pauseStop)
        Saves end of MCode for later use for CommandProcessing.
        Parameters:
        pauseStop - - Case 1: end simulation, 0: nothing, -1: pause

      • drawLine

        public void drawLine​(int x2,
                     int y2,
                     boolean mill)
              throws OutOfWorksurfaceException,
                     CanNotMillException
        Method for calculating and store values of a line. Can be adjusted for milling to be reusable.
        Parameters:
        x2 - - target value for x coordinate
        y2 - - target value for y coordinate
        mill - - true -> milling on; false -> milling off
        Throws:
        OutOfWorksurfaceException
        CanNotMillException

      • drawCircle

        public void drawCircle​(int x2,
                       int y2,
                       int i,
                       int j,
                       boolean circleDirection)
                throws OutOfWorksurfaceException,
                       UndefinedAngleException,
                       CanNotMillException
        Method for calculating and store values of a circle or part of a circle.
        Parameters:
        x2 - - target value for x coordinate
        y2 - - target value for y coordinate
        i - - relative offset of x value for circlecenter
        j - - relative offset of y value for circlecenter
        circleDirection - (true -> counter clockwise direction; false -> clockwise direction
        Throws:
        OutOfWorksurfaceException
        UndefinedAngleException
        CanNotMillException
